resources.string:
Android Lookup
 
 This is an Android utility based on the *nix utility nslookup.
 
 To lookup an IP Address:
 Enter a hostname in the "Host Name" field. Then press the lookup button. The IP Address will be displayed in the "IP Address" field.
 
 To lookup a Host Name:
 Enter an IP Address in the "IP Address" field. Then press the lookup button. The hostname will be displayed in the "Host Name" field.
 
 Note:
 Sometimes the hostname lookup may return an unexpected hostname for an IP Address. This is because a single IP Address will often have one Canonical (true) hostname, but many aliases.
 
 See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Canonical_name_record
 Acknowledgments:
 
 Special thanks to:
 John Ingram and Greg Edison in Clemson University's CPSC 481/681 class.
